Items.Name: Alien Obduction
Items.Text:
Success: Gain 1 Scientist

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Alien Scout
Items.Text: While in play the other Threats have +1 Health

Items.Name: Terraforming Drone
Items.Text: Failure: If this not the third wave then face this threat next round. If this is the third wave lose the game

Items.Name: Alien Field Scientist
Items.Text:
Success: Gain 1 [^Genetics]

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Alien Mining Drone
Items.Text:
Success: Gain 1 [^Robotics]

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Steal Technology
Items.Text: Failure: Lose one of your inventions

Items.Name: Alien Cult
Items.Text: While in play the other Threats have +1 Health

Items.Name: Mental Probing
Items.Text:
Sucess: Gain 1 research of your choice

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Crystal Mining
Items.Text:
Success: Gain 1 [^Magic]

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Scanner Drone
Items.Text:
Success: Look at your next draft pack

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Blaster Invader
Items.Text: Success: This counts as an invention that deals 1 damage to a Threat

Items.Name: Alien Brute
Items.Text: They take 1 less damage from all sources to a minimum of 1

Items.Name: Alien Saboteur
Items.Text:
Can only be damaged by being directly targeted

Failure: The next invention you use has no effect

Items.Name: Plant Explosive Crystals
Items.Text:
After each of your turns, add a counter to this, if this gets to 3 counters, you automatically fail this Threat

Success: You may discard this to deal 3 damage to another Threat

Items.Name: Shrink Ray Invader
Items.Text:
Success: One of your other threats counts as having half max health rounded down

Failure: For the rest of the game one of your scientists only gains half research rounded down

Items.Name: Shielded Invader
Items.Text: This unit ignores the first packet of damage it takes

Items.Name: Alien Wild Beast
Items.Text: Success or Failure: Gain 1 [^Genetics]

Items.Name: Shield Drone
Items.Text: This unit prevents the first damage you deal to any threat this turn

Items.Name: Alien Mystic
Items.Text: Failure: Aliens gain 1 research, lose the next invention you invent, and gain 4 VP

Items.Name: Teleportation Unit
Items.Text: Failure: If this is the first time you failed to them don't lose VP instead face them next round but they gain 3 strength, and are instead Covert

Items.Name: Hover Troops
Items.Text: Success: gain 2 [^Robotics]

Items.Name: Swarmers
Items.Text: This can only take 1 damage at a time

Items.Name: Stasis Ship
Items.Text:
While facing this you may not use your last unused invention

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Disruption Team
Items.Text:
While this is in play each of your invention do 1 less damage

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Infiltrate Labs
Items.Text: Failure: Lose all your research

Items.Name: Purifier Unit
Items.Text: Ignore's taking damage packets less than 2

Items.Name: Alien Jammer
Items.Text:
If this can be targeted it must be targeted by inventions

Failure: Face this threat next round

Items.Name: Regenerative Invader
Items.Text: After each time this takes damage it heals 1

Items.Name: Alien Science Ship
Items.Text:
Success: Treat this as an invention that gains 1 resource of your choice

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Incubate New Soldiers
Items.Text:
Success: After drafting you may discard one threat next round

Failure: After drafting draw one more threat next round

Items.Name: Shapeshifter Infiltrator
Items.Text:
Can only be damaged by being directly targeted

Failure: Aliens gain 1 research

Items.Name: Alien Sniper
Items.Text:
Success: Gain 1 [^Genetics]

Failure: Lose 1 scientist

Items.Name: Disintegration Unit
Items.Text: After each of your actions, add a counter to this, if this gets to 4 counters, you automatically fail this Threat

Items.Name: Brainwashed Commando
Items.Text: Success: If you defeat him with exact damage, gain another scientist

Items.Name: Alien Tactician
Items.Text: While you face this threat all threats with a default max HP of 4 or less have +2 HP

Items.Name: Infiltrate A Megacorp
Items.Text: Failure: You skip getting research at the start of next turn

Items.Name: Alien Adventurers
Items.Text:
For every 2 damage on this, disable one of the following powers.
When dealt damage take 1 less
After being dealt damage heal 1
After being dealt damage you lose 1 Victory Point
Failure: Alien gains 1 Research

Items.Name: Teleportation Ship
Items.Text: This unit prevents the first damage you deal to this threat this turn

Items.Name: Alien Master Criminal
Items.Text:
Can't be damaged by robotic inventions

Success: You may lose this to discard another threat

Failure: Expend 1 Scientist at the start of next turn
Items.Flavor: Why kill me? I'm sure I could be so much more useful to you

Items.Name: Teleportation Master
Items.Text:
Each odd numbered time this Threat is hit, this Threat ignores the damage

Failure: Aliens gain 1 Research

Items.Name: Mind Control Expert
Items.Text:
After each action lose 1 science (priority [^Magic], Genetic, Robotic)

Success: gain 3 [^Magic]

Items.Name: Stealth Ship
Items.Text: Can't be directly targeted

Items.Name: Shapeshifter Assassin
Items.Text:
Can only be damaged by being directly targeted

Failure: Lose 1 Scientist and lose all research
Items.Flavor: How do I know you are not a shapeshifter?

Items.Name: Infiltrate Government
Items.Text: After drafting face Government Military Threat

Items.Name: Establish Homeworld Portal
Items.Text:
You may choose to fail this Threat whenever

Failure: Face the top card of Alien Level 2

Items.Name: Hypnotize Population
Items.Text: After each of your turns you expend a Scientist

Items.Name: Alien Plague
Items.Text: Each time this is damaged but not destroyed make an identical copy of it with the same amount of damage

Items.Name: Steal A City
Items.Text:
Inventions deal 1 additional damage to this

Failure: Aliens gain 1 Research

Items.Name: Alien Moon Base
Items.Text: Success: Gain 1 Additional Victory Point for every Robotic Invention at end of game

Items.Name: Alien Drop Pods
Items.Text: Counts as 3 threats for targeting

Items.Name: Purifier Ship
Items.Text: Ignore's taking damage packets less than 3

Items.Name: Disintegration Ship
Items.Text: After each of your actions, add a counter to this, if this gets to 5 counters, you automatically fail this Threat

Items.Name: Alien Dragon
Items.Text: Success: gain 3 [^Genetics]

Items.Name: Dreadnought Ship
Items.Text: Success: Worth 1 additional Victory Point for each other ship you destroyed

Items.Name: Alien Space Station
Items.Text:
After each of you turns, gain a counter when it has 3 counters remove them and Aliens gain 1 research

Success: gain 3 [^Robotics]

Items.Name: Toxic Clouds
Items.Text: Success: Deal 3 damage to all other Biological Threats

Items.Name: Alien Orbital Laser
Items.Text: After each action lose a VP if this is undamaged but if it is damaged it heals 1 health

Items.Name: Mothership
Items.Text: After draft phase draw 3 addtional level 1 Threats to face

Items.Name: Alien Assult Platform
Items.Text: After each action lose a VP

Items.Name: Government Military
Items.Text: "Infiltrate Government" can not be damaged
